column1: Table 5.8: Details of Bandiyawa Wewa related improvement cost in MWS-014

column2:
1. Dense planting of mixed vegetation comprising Agave/ Kumbuk/ Mee/ Madan/ Nelli/ Durian/ Mandarin/ Orange/ Avocado/ Guava/ Mango/ Aththikka/ Wal del/ Kekuna etc randomly mixed seedlings at 500 mm grid intervals for 1500 m2. & Apply mulching, organic manure, and NPK fertilizer.
2. Introduction of Bamboo, Vetiver grass, and riparian plants. Covered area 200 m2and a row of Areca nut trees.
3. Maintain for six months and continue watering for one year as required. 
4.Desilt about 1500cum using PC 30 excavator and tractor trailers
